description: A lightweight insulated gilet that can be used as an extra mid layer or protective outer for all mountain and outdoor action. A combination of dual weight insulation and fast wicking fabrics provides the ultimate balance of warmth and breathability.
name: Rab Xenair Vest - Mens

specs.value: 20D Pertex Quantum Air nylon (47gsm) \ DWR \ 1 cfm - 100% polyamide
60gsm Primaloft Gold Insulation Active+ (55% Recycled Content)
